oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime.util.common
Class RequiredValidator

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime.util.common.InterSegmentValidator
      oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime.util.common.RequiredValidator

public class RequiredValidator
extends InterSegmentValidator

A validator to check if a required segment has a non-null value.
